mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(t_sport_record.id))AS times,COUNT(DISTINCT(t_sport_record.venue_id))AS ft_number ,SUM(t_sport_record.score)AS total_score,COUNT(DISTINCT(t_venue.city)) AS city_number FROM t_sport_record LEFT JOIN t_venue ON t_sport_record.`venue_id`=t_venue.`id` WHERE t_sport_record.user_id = ${userId}

SELECT r.`id`,r.`create_time`,r.`user_id`,r.`level` AS LEVEL,r.`score` AS score,r.`spend_time`,r.`concern_id`,r.`venue_id`,v.`name`,v.`img_urls` FROM t_sport_record r LEFT JOIN t_venue v ON r.`venue_id` = v.`id` WHERE r.`user_id`=#{userId} ORDER BY r.`create_time` DESC

SELECT t_venue.city,t_sport_record.venue_id,t_venue.name AS venue_name,t_venue.address,COUNT(t_sport_record.`venue_id`)AS fp_number,t_venue.`longitude`,t_venue.`latitude` FROM t_sport_record LEFT JOIN t_venue ON t_sport_record.`venue_id` = t_venue.`id` WHERE t_sport_record.user_id=#{userId} AND city=#{city} GROUP BY t_sport_record.venue_id

SELECT venue.city,COUNT(record.venue_id)AS fp_number,venue.`img_urls` FROM t_sport_record record LEFT JOIN t_venue venue ON record.`venue_id` = venue.`id` WHERE record.user_id=${userId} GROUP BY record.`venue_id`

SELECT t_venue.city,t_sport_record.venue_id,t_venue.name AS venue_name,t_venue.address,COUNT(t_sport_record.venue_id)AS fp_number,t_venue.longitude,t_venue.latitude FROM t_sport_record LEFT JOIN t_venue ON t_sport_record.`venue_id` = t_venue.`id` WHERE t_sport_record.user_id=#{userId} GROUP BY t_sport_record.venue_id ORDER BY city
SELECT @row := @row + 1 AS row_num,sr.user_id,SUM(sr.score) AS total_score FROM t_sport_record sr ,(SELECT @row := 0) r GROUP BY sr.user_id ORDER BY total_score DESC LIMIT ${offset},${pageSize}
SELECT u.nickname,u.avatar,u.authenticate,l.`step` ,l.`name` AS levelName FROM user u LEFT JOIN level l ON u.`level_id`=l.`id` WHERE u.id=#{userId}

SELECT * FROM( SELECT @row := @row + 1 AS row_num,sr.user_id,SUM(sr.score) AS total_score FROM t_sport_record sr ,(SELECT @row := 0) r GROUP BY sr.user_id ORDER BY total_score DESC ) sort_table WHERE user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY total_score
